details:
verb
- to give heed to
= example: to give heed to
= synonyms: hang
- to work for or be a servant to
= example: to work for or be a servant to
= synonyms: assist
- to take charge of or deal with
= example: to take charge of or deal with
= synonyms: look
- to be present at
= example: to be present at
= synonyms: go to
- to accompany as a circumstance or follow as a result
= example: to accompany as a circumstance or follow as a result
